tools.name: recipes_get_recipe
tools.description: Retrieve a recipe by ID, including title and content (ingredients, instructions, etc). Use this before summarizing or editing a recipe. Recipe IDs come from URLs like /dashboard/recipes/{recipeId}.

recipeId.description: Recipe ID (the UUID in /dashboard/recipes/{recipeId}). When the user is viewing a recipe, this is the ID from the current URL.

maxChars.description: Optional max characters of recipe content to return.

tools.name: recipes_get_comments
tools.description: Retrieve comment threads on a recipe. Use to see feedback, suggestions, or discussion attached to a recipe.

includeResolved.description: Include resolved threads. Defaults to true.

limitThreads.description: Maximum number of threads to return.

maxCharsPerComment.description: Maximum comment content size in chars per comment.

tools.name: recipes_create_recipe
tools.description: Create a new recipe. Use when the user wants to add a new recipe to their cookbook. Returns the new recipe's ID and URL.

tools.name: recipes_update_recipe
tools.description: Update a recipe's title and/or content. Use this to save edits when the user asks you to add ingredients, change instructions, fix typos, or revise a recipe. Content is rich text.

tools.name: recipes_add_comment
tools.description: Create a new comment thread on a recipe. Use when the user wants to add a note, suggestion, or discussion point to a recipe.

content.description: Comment content for the new thread.

anchorText.description: Optional anchor text to attach the comment to a specific part of the recipe.

tools.name: recipes_reply_to_comment
tools.description: Add a reply to an existing comment thread on a recipe.
